page.title: 15FARMING CALENDAR
page.content: The workig day and year at Robinson's Farm is as follows. 07-15 The local staff get up 08-00 The staff meet in the canteen for a brew and to be given their orders. 08-20 The average working day begins 10-30 mid morning break. 12-00 Lunch break. 13-00 Afternoon work begins. 15-00 Optional break. 17-15 Work ends. At busy periods there may be overtime. YEAR November-March. Plough, harvest cabbage and sprouts and bag potatoes for storage. March-July. Sow and plant. June-October. Harvest corn, potatoes and vegetables.
